00019 #include "GenericFileWriter.h"
00020 
00021 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00022 
00023 GenericFileWriter::GenericFileWriter(FileHeader* p, bool truncate) 
00024 {
00025         fileHdr = p;
00026         OpenFileOStream(fileHdr->GetFilename(), truncate);
00027         CreateWriters();
00028 }
00029 
00030 GenericFileWriter::~GenericFileWriter() 
00031 {
00032         writers.clear();
00033         os.flush();
00034         os.close(); 
00035 }
00036 
00037 int32_t GenericFileWriter::GetFilePos()
00038 {
00039         return os.tellp();
00040 }
00041 
00042 void GenericFileWriter::SeekFromCurrentPos(int32_t offset)
00043 {
00044         os.seekp(offset, std::ios::cur);
00045 }
00046 
00047 void GenericFileWriter::SeekFromBeginPos(int32_t offset)
00048 {
00049         os.seekp(offset, std::ios::beg);
00050 }
00051 
00052 void GenericFileWriter::SeekFromEndPos(int32_t offset)
00053 {
00054         os.seekp(offset, std::ios::end);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void GenericFileWriter::WriteHeader()
00058 {
00059         FileHeaderWriter writer;
00060         writer.Write(os, *fileHdr);
00061         writer.UpdateDataGroupOffset(os, os.tellp());
00062 }
00063 
00064 DataGroupWriter& GenericFileWriter::GetDataGroupWriter(int32_t index)
00065 {
00066         return writers[index];
00067 }
00068 
00069 int32_t GenericFileWriter::GetDataGroupCnt()
00070 {
00071         return (int32_t)writers.size();
00072 }
00073 
00074 void GenericFileWriter::GetDataGroupWriters(DataGroupWriterIt &begin, DataGroupWriterIt &end)
00075 {
00076         begin = writers.begin();
00077         end = writers.end();
00078 }
00079 
00080 void GenericFileWriter::OpenFileOStream(const std::string &file, bool truncate)
00081 {
00082         if(truncate)
00083         {
00084                 os.open(file.c_str(), std::ios::out|std::ios::trunc|std::ios::binary);
00085         }
00086         else
00087         {
00088                 os.open(file.c_str(), std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00089         }
00090         if (!os)
00091         {
00092                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileCreateException e;
00093                 throw e;
00094         }
00095 }
00096 
00097 void GenericFileWriter::CreateWriters()
00098 {
00099         int sz = fileHdr->GetDataGroupCnt();
00100         for(int i = 0; i < sz; i++)
00101         {
00102                 DataGroupWriter* p = CreateDataGroupWriter(fileHdr->GetDataGroup(i));
00103                 writers.push_back(*p);
00104                 delete p;
00105         }
00106 }
00107 
00108 DataGroupWriter* GenericFileWriter::CreateDataGroupWriter(DataGroupHeader& hdr)
00109 {
00110         return new DataGroupWriter(&os, &hdr);
00111 }
00112 
00113 void GenericFileWriter::Write(u_int32_t p)
00114 {
00115         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(os, p);
00116 }
